mapper.insert: insert into FUND_UNIT_CONTRIBUTION_ORG (SERIALNO, RELATIVESERIALNO, INPUTDATE, UPDATEUSERID, UPDATEDATE, INPUTUSERID, INPUTORGID, UPDATEORGID, ORGTYPE, ORGNAME, ORGCODE, CONTRIBUTIONPROPORTION, INCOMEDISTRIBUTIONMODE, INCOMERATIO, CAPITALCOST, MARGINLEVEL) values (#{serialno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relativeserialno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputorgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateorgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contributionproportion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{incomedistributionmode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{incomeratio,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{capitalcost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{marginlevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select SERIALNO, RELATIVESERIALNO, INPUTDATE, UPDATEUSERID, UPDATEDATE, INPUTUSERID, INPUTORGID, UPDATEORGID, ORGTYPE, ORGNAME, ORGCODE, CONTRIBUTIONPROPORTION, INCOMEDISTRIBUTIONMODE, INCOMERATIO, CAPITALCOST, MARGINLEVEL from FUND_UNIT_CONTRIBUTION_ORG where SERIALNO = #{serialno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SERIALNO, RELATIVESERIALNO, INPUTDATE, UPDATEUSERID, UPDATEDATE, INPUTUSERID, INPUTORGID, UPDATEORGID, ORGTYPE, ORGNAME, ORGCODE, CONTRIBUTIONPROPORTION, INCOMEDISTRIBUTIONMODE, INCOMERATIO, CAPITALCOST, MARGINLEVEL from FUND_UNIT_CONTRIBUTION_ORG
